text:
...Awesome! That was great!
The on-air was amazing!

Mikoto-chan's calm voice... it's so nice, right?
Reading letters leisurely like that could become addictive.

...Thank you very much.
I'm not really used to it.

No no,
both of you should host a show solo, you know?

<line-height=80%><size=80%>I'm really looking forward to Mikoto-san's solo,
but honestly, if that happens, I'll end up writing a ton of letters,
so my sleep time will be severely cut...

Hahaha, that's dangerous!
You'll probably get some intensely decorated letters!

...
Will you send messages to the station?

...! W-Well... if it's bothersome, of course,
I mean...

You can tell me anytime
if it's bothering you.
